content.d: Eh!? Ai-san, are you really going to buy that...!?
I’m gonna buy it... it’s a special day, after all...
T-True, you’re right. We’re getting treats for tonight’s concert and the Christmas party... But......
I get it, I get it! It’s the fancy chips we usually can’t buy! But hey, it’s Christmas, right?
Alright, I understand. As the treasurer for our shopping, I’ll approve.
Yay! So, which flavor should we choose? Powerful Consommé, Supreme Sesame Oil, or Exquisite Seaweed Salt?
Let’s go for all of them...!! Let’s reward ourselves with these luxurious chips and give our best at tonight’s live performance!
